import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FiPower, FiTrash2 } from 'react-icons/fi' import api from '../../services/api' import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg' import heroesImg from '../../assets/heroes.png' import './styles.css' export default function Profile() { const [incidents, setIncidents] = useState([]) const ongId = localStorage.getItem('ongId') const ongName = localStorage.getItem('ongName') useEffect(()=>{ api.get('profile', { headers: { Authorization: ongId, } }).then(response => { setIncidents(response.incidents) }) }, [ongId]) return (
Welcome, {ongName} Cadastrar novo caso
